conbody.p:
A route must be released for it to be available in a work order or a process order. The following conditions apply when you release a route:
You can release a route only if it is in the draft state.
You cannot release a route that is archived.
You cannot modify a route that is released. However, you can revise or copy the route after it is released.
After you release a route, you cannot reverse the action.
